text: Are katanik, jix chitatabꞌelaꞌ jas kel ri xubꞌij ri Dios are xubꞌij we tzij riꞌ: Are kawaj in utz kixnoꞌjin kukꞌ ri winaq, man are ta kawaj kikꞌam la ri isipanik chinuwach.9:13 Oseas 6:6. Xinpe in chikisikꞌixik ri aꞌjmakibꞌ rech kuꞌx nutijoxelabꞌ, man are ta in petinaq chikisikꞌixik ri sibꞌalaj e utz taq winaq kakinaꞌo.
